text: WZ and ZZ designed the study. YaoW, SZ, and YC performed the experiments. TW constructed the expression plasmids. CD performed flow cytometry. WX generated the antibody against 3D pol of CVB3. XF, CQ, and YanW prepared the primary cells of the mice. WZ, YaoW, and ZZ analyzed the data. WZ and ZZ drafted the manuscript. Remaining authors provided substantial support during the implementation of this study. All authors read and approved the final version of the manuscript.
